ygData.subject: Re: What weapons to use??
ygData.msgSnippet: pending lore means it will be lore soon.  so you cant have just 2.  They put in pending lore to give you time to get rid of it ... From: Dean Boyle
ygData.messageBody:
pending lore means it will be lore soon. so you cant have just 2. They put
in pending lore to give you time to get rid of it

----- Original Message -----
From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 10:47 PM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] What weapons to use??


> From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
> I'm sorry but PGT tommies are not lore, there pending lore, witch mean you
> can have at the most 2.. and painbringers are just no drop, it's not even
> lore
>
>
>
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] What weapons to use??
> Date: Wed, 14 Jul 1999 08:26:58 -0500
>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Well I believe the lore item weapons you will only be able to get one.
You
> will be able to get 1 PGT, or 1 Painbringer, but not two of each. Also
> Ghoulsbane is Paladin only so you won't be able to even get one of those.
> Start working on your piercing right now and get a Dragoon Dirk, they are
> better than a combine longsword. I was able to take out Dvinn with a
level
> 19 enchanter and get my Dragoon Dirk instead of buying it (I was level 20)
> but you can buy one for around 20 plat. At level 21 I haven't seen my
> strength bonus yet. I have been hitting for the occasional 14 since level
> 17 though with a combine longsword.
>
> You may need to check your numbers though. I have a 110 in Double attack
> and dual wield. I double attack maybe 75-80% of the time and dual wield
> happens maybe 30%, so 44-48 dmg per round is probably not correct. You
> really should spend the money now for another combine weapon though. You
> can solo scarecrows at your level with two magical weapons. Also if you
> play a large race the magical slam is one of the best skills a warrior can
> have.
>
> Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Dean Boyle[SMTP:gino_14@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 8:15 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] What weapons to use??
> >
> > From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
> >
> > Hail to thee, I am of the 17th level and right now i duel Weild a
Combine
> > Long Sword and a Fine Steel Long sword (both same stats). Right now I
do
> > about 24 each hand and since I am already maxed my level out in duel
> > weild,
> > double attack and 1h slashing, I duel and double attack almost every
hit.
> > so
> > thast about 44-48 dmg per round.
> >
> > I've always herd at high levels that you not only hit for 12 (sometimes
> > 13)
> > but more... I've never seen this happen to me, when will I start
hitting
> > for
> > more? Whast going on with this area?
> >
> > double combine long swords are great, but I need some advise...
> >
> > I think when I hit lvl 20, I'm going to upgrade my weaponry.
> > Do I go for some PGT's or shold I try and go for some Painbringers or
> > should
> > I even go for soem gnoulbanes? (BTW I am going to duel weild and want
2x
> > the
> > weapon)
> >
> > at lvl 20, what will be the idle and most level area weapon can I even
> > get??
> > Thnx for your time.
> >
> > Dealan
> > Of the 17th level
> > Karana
